level.heading: In general
level.text: Notwithstanding any other law, except as provided in subsection (c) of this section, all permanent bills and resolutions shall be accompanied by a fiscal impact statement before final adoption by the Council.

level.heading: Contents
level.text: The fiscal impact statement shall include the estimate of the costs which will be incurred by the District as a result of the enactment of the measure in the current and each of the first four fiscal years for which the act or resolution is in effect, together with a statement of the basis for such estimate.

level.heading: Appropriations
level.text: Permanent and emergency acts which are accompanied by fiscal impact statements which reflect unbudgeted costs, shall be subject to appropriations prior to becoming effective.

level.heading: Applicability
level.text: Subsection (a) shall not apply to emergency declaration, ceremonial, confirmation, and sense of the Council resolutions.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 17-353, in the section credit, validated a previously made technical correction.
